resources.string:
Your job is to display a list of menu items. Each item has an id, a name, a description, and a photo URI.
Tasks:
1. Fetch data from
		 https://api.myjson.com/bins/kvdzh
2. Persist the data in the Realm database
3. Display a list of food items with name and photo
4. Clicking on a food item opens up a detail view with name, photo and description
Remove this card and replace it with the food items content
Something went wrong, Please try again.
